name: Aquanaut
description:
You’re on excavation to the bottom of the Mariana trench, with a mission to pick up trash. But look out, there are lots of steel-eating sharks, that’ll put holes in your submarine!

Remember to refill your oxygen by clicking the cylinder on top of the submarine.

Controls:
WASD to boost around
ctrl/shift to go up/down 
RMB to swim fast 
You go in the direction you're pointing LMB to interact

Made for GGJ20: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/aquanaut-6
